description.english: Well played! You've met Faye.
description.german: Faye kennenlernen.
description.french: Bien joué ! Vous avez rencontré Faye.
description.spanish: Bien jugado ! Has conocido a Faye.
description.russian: Отлично, вы познакомились с Фэй.
description.brazilian: Boa jogada! Você encontrou Faye.

description.english: Well played! You've met Cliff.
description.german: Super! Du hast Cliff kennen gelernt.
description.french: Bien joué ! Vous avez rencontré Cliff.
description.spanish: Bien jugado ! Has conocido a Cliff.
description.russian: Отлично, вы познакомились с Клиффом.
description.brazilian: Boa jogada! Você encontrou Cliff.

description.english: Well played! You've met a looter.
description.german: Super! Du bist einem Plünderer begegnet.
description.french: Bien joué ! Vous avez rencontré un pillard.
description.spanish: Bien jugado ! Has conocido a un saqueador.
description.russian: Хорошо сыграно! Вы встретились с мародером.
description.brazilian: Boa jogada! Você encontrou um saqueador.

description.english: Well played! You've met Caïn.
description.german: Super! Du hast mit Caïn Bekanntschaft geschlossen.
description.french: Bien joué ! Vous avez rencontré Caïn.
description.spanish: Bien jugado ! Has conocido a Caïn.
description.russian: Отлично сыграно! Вы встретили Каина.
description.brazilian: Boa jogada! Você encontrou Caïn.

description.english: Well played! You've met Joanne.
description.german: Super! Du hast Joanne kennen gelernt.
description.french: Bien joué ! Vous avez rencontré Joanne.
description.spanish: Bien jugado ! Has conocido a Joanne.
description.russian: Отлично сыграно! Вы встретили Джоанну.
description.brazilian: Boa jogada! Você encontrou Joanne.

description.english: Well played! You've met Tim.
description.german: Super! Du hast Tim kennen gelernt.
description.french: Bien joué ! Vous avez rencontré Tim.
description.spanish: Bien jugado ! Has conocido a Tim.
description.russian: Отлично сыграно! Вы встретили Тима.
description.brazilian: Boa jogada! Você encontrou Tim.

description.english: Wow! Faye just turned into a zombie!
description.german: Wow! Faye ist in ein Zombie verwandelt worden.
description.french: Whaou ! Faye vient de se transformer en zombie !
description.spanish: Guauu ! Faye acaba de convertirse en un zombie!
description.russian: Воу! Фэй превратилась в зомби!
description.brazilian: Wow! Faye acabou de se transformar em um zumbi.

description.english: Well played! You've reached the gas station.
description.german: Super! Du bist an der Tankstelle angekommen.
description.french: Bien joué ! Vous avez atteint la station service.
description.spanish: Bien jugado ! Has llegado a la estación de servicio.
description.russian: Отлично сыграно! Вы добрались до автозаправки.
description.brazilian: Boa jogada! Você chegou ao posto de gasolina.

description.english: Well played! You've reached the police station.
description.german: Super! Du befindest dich nun auf dem Polizeirevier.
description.french: Bien joué ! Vous avez atteint le commissariat de police.
description.spanish: Bien jugado ! Has llegado a la estación de policía.
description.russian: Отлично! Вы добралирсь до полицейского участка.
description.brazilian: Boa jogada! Você chegou à delegacia de polícia.
